mapper.sql: ID, REAL_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, QQ, WX, WEI_BO, PHOTO, LEVEL, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATED, MODIFIER, MODIFIED, VERSION
mapper.select: SELECT ID, REAL_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, QQ, WX, WEI_BO, PHOTO, LEVEL, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATED, MODIFIER, MODIFIED, VERSION FROM mdc_user WHERE ID = #{id} AND STATUS = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mdc_user( ID, REAL_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, QQ, WX, WEI_BO, PHOTO, LEVEL, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATED, MODIFIER, MODIFIED, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{realName}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{qq}, #{wx}, #{weiBo}, #{photo}, #{level}, #{status}, #{creator}, now(), #{modifier}, now(), #{version} );
